document.full_text: the antitrust suit filed by nfl players against the league will be heard on april 6 in a federal court in minnesota, according to court documents released on monday.
document.title: players case against nfl to be heard on april 6
lines_and_colors: the antitrust suit filed by nfl players against the league will be heard on april 6 in a federal court in minnesota, according to court documents released on monday.
